Aisha Jummai Al-Hassan (A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị iri na isii n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ1959 ọ we nwụọ na ụbọchị asaá n'ọnwa Mee n'afo 2021), a maara nke ọma dị ka Mama Taraba,ọ bụ onye ọka iwu na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria. A họpụtara ya n'afọ 2015 ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari mgbe a họpụtara ya ruo mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na Julaị  n'2018.
Ọ bụbu onye omeiwu, na-anọchite anya Taraba North senatorial district nke Taraba Steeti, Niagirịa nke ọ meriri n'okpuru ikpo okwu nke People's Democratic Party (PDP)
O mechara banye n'òtù ndị isi na-emegide ya bụ All Progressive Congress (APC) wee bụrụ onye na-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ nke pati ahụ na Taraba Steeti maka ntuli aka nke afọ 2015

E meriri ya na ntuli aka e mere n'ụbọchị iri abụo na ise n'onwaEprel n'afọ 2015, mana na ụbọchị asaá n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ2015 ụlọ ikpe wepụrụ Gọvanọ Taraba, Darius Ishaku, kwupụtara na Aisha Alhassan nke All Progressives Congress meriri na ntuliaka n'ụbọchị iri na otu n'ọnwa Eprel  n'afọ2015.
